subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sophia Young scored 21 points, including a 14-foot turnaround shot at the buzzer to lift the San Antonio Silver Stars to a 67-66 victory at home over the Los Angeles Sparks, forcing a deciding Game 3 in the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
snippet: Sophia Young scored 21 points, including a 14-foot turnaround shot at the buzzer to lift the San Antonio Silver Stars to a 67-66 victory at home over the Los Angeles Sparks, forcing a deciding Game 3 in the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
